thread.title: Houston Restaurant Violations Feb. 01 - Feb.08
thread.title_full: Houston Restaurant Violations Feb. 01 - Feb.08 - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Houston Restaurant Violations Feb. 01 - Feb.08
text:
Photo: Yelp Image 1 of / 24 24 Hank's Cajun Crawfish 10800 Bellaire Houston, TX 77072
Demerits: 68 Inspection Highlights: Observed hot water 90 degrees F at the three compartment sink. Food services operation is ceased.
Photo: Yelp/Charena C. less Hank's Cajun Crawfish 10800 Bellaire Houston, TX 77072
Demerits: 68 ... more Photo: Yelp Image 2 of 24 Mexico's Deli 2374 Dairy Ashford Houston, TX 77077
Demerits: 18 Inspection Highlights: Measured internal temperature of beans at 59.8 degrees F. Discard food as soon as possible. Potentially hazardous food not held at 41 degrees F. or below or at 135 degrees F. or above while being (stored/prepared/displayed transported).
Observed cooked chicken not protected from cross contamination by separating raw chicken from ready to eat food. Ready to eat food must be separated from raw food to prevent cross contamination.
Photo: Yelp/Barney S. less Mexico's Deli 2374 Dairy Ashford Houston, TX 77077
Demerits: 18 ... more Photo: Yelp Image 3 of 24 Paseo Catracho 11503 Airline Rd., Houston, TX 77037
Demerits: 24 Inspection Highlights: Observed employee consuming food and drinking from open beverage container, where drinks being served. Corrected on site.
Replace/repair all damaged ceiling tiles in the kitchen/food preparation/storage areas. less Paseo Catracho 11503 Airline Rd., Houston, TX 77037
Demerits: 24 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 4 of 24 Pollos Asados El Regio #4 9510 Beechnut Ste. H Houston, TX 77036
Demerits: 41 Inspection Highlights: Establishment not in compliance with Article II, Food Ordinance. Observed sewage water back up in food preparation area. See general comments TC.
Observed sewage water back up in food preparation area. Dispose sewage/liquid properly. less Pollos Asados El Regio #4 9510 Beechnut Ste. H Houston, TX 77036
Demerits: 41 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 5 of 24 Nelore Churrascaria 4412 Montrose Blvd., Houston, TX 77006
Demerits: 20 Inspection Highlights: Sewage/liquid waste not being disposed of properly by a public sewage system. Observed waste water from hand washing sink leaking onto floor. Correction repair plumbing at hand washing sink. less Nelore Churrascaria 4412 Montrose Blvd., Houston, TX 77006
Demerits: 20 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 6 of 24 Jack in the Box #0672 8767 S Main Houston, TX 77025
Demerits: 17 Inspection Highlights: Measured internal temperature of potentially hazardous food (chicken 49.6 degrees F and bacon bits 50 degrees F) not held at 41 degrees F. or below as specified while being stored. Bacon bits put into freezer to quick chill. Chicken discarded. less Jack in the Box #0672 8767 S Main Houston, TX 77025
Demerits: 17 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 7 of 24 Filipino Cuisine 10950 Bissonnet Ste. B160 Houston, TX 77099
Demerits: 25 Inspection Highlights: Observed 1) Uncovered food on prep tables. 2) Food being stored in "Thank You" bags. Provide food approval material when storing food. Cover all food to protect from possible cross contamination.
Observed chemical cleaning solutions (degreaser, Lysol spray) being stored with food (flour, rice, can foods) in dry storage area. Separate chemicals from foods to prevent contamination of foods.
Photo: Yelp/Fillipino Cuisine less Filipino Cuisine 10950 Bissonnet Ste. B160 Houston, TX 77099
Demerits: 25 ... more Photo: Yelp Image 8 of 24 Mala Sichuan Bistro 1201 Westheimer Ste. B Houston, TX 77006
Demerits: 27 Inspection Highlights: Observed raw fish being stored over fresh vegetables in walk-in cooler. Raw foods must be stored under ready to eat foods.
Observed uncovered fish under dusty/dirty shelf in walk-in cooler. Cover food to be protected from dust, dirt and other debris.
Food service manager operating/causing to be operated a food establishment without the person in charge having in his possession a Food Service Manager's Certification issued by the department. Reciprocity Food service Manager Certificate to City of Houston Call 281-393-5100.
less Mala Sichuan Bistro 1201 Westheimer Ste. B ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 9 of 24 Tropical Fruit #2 5726 Fondren Houston, TX 77036
Demerits: 54 Inspection Highlights: Establishment not in compliance with Article II, Food Ordinance. 1. No hot water provided at hand-sink and three-compartment sink. 2.Failure of mobile food unit to return to the commissary for the performance of all servicing operations within the 24-hour period preceding operations. less Tropical Fruit #2 5726 Fondren Houston, TX 77036
Demerits: 54 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 10 of 24 Marble Slab Creamery 17195 Tomball Pkwy 77064
Demerits: 57 Inspection Highlights: Establishment not in compliance with Article II, Food Ordinance. Hot water at the three-compartment sink not at 110 degrees F. Establishment is closed.
Photo: Yelp/Bruce O. less Marble Slab Creamery 17195 Tomball Pkwy 77064
Demerits: 57 Inspection ... more Photo: Yelp Image 11 of 24 Brewingz 9410 North Fwy Houston, TX 77037
Demerits: 16 Inspection Highlights: Cooked chili/liquid cheese not safe for human consumption. Condemned approximately 10 pounds of temperature control for safety foods, not cooled from 135 degrees F to 41 degrees F within six hours.
less Brewingz 9410 North Fwy Houston, TX 77037
Demerits: 16 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 12 of 24 Sabor Central American Cuisine 5712 Bellaire Blvd., Houston, TX 77081
Demerits: 38 Inspection Highlights: Observed infestation of live roaches and fresh rodent droppings. Establishment must remain closed until pest control treatment is provided. Notify inspector when ready for re-inspection.
Observed several live roaches inside of cooling unit that is no longer being used. Remove from establishment to help eliminate presence of roaches in establishment. Contact pest control to have treatment performed.
Photo: Yelp/Liz N. less Sabor Central American Cuisine 5712 Bellaire Blvd., Houston, TX 77081
Demerits: 38 ... more Photo: Yelp Image 13 of 24 Burger King #4720 535 El Dorado Blvd., Houston, TX 77598
Demerits : 36 Inspection Highlights: Establishment not in compliance with Article II, Food Ordinance. Observed sewage collecting in back of establishment in mop sink area. Establishment stated that sewage backup is often reoccurring .
less Burger King #4720 535 El Dorado Blvd., Houston,
... more Photo: Google Maps Image 14 of 24 Chatt-N-Paan 6121 Hillcroft Ste. M2 Houston, TX 77081
Demerits: 23 Inspection Highlights: 1) Observed large prep cooler not cooling properly. Quarantined. Repair and notify inspector prior to use. Note: Manager stated that the food had not been in cooler for more than four hours. Rapidly cool all PHF and maintain at 41 degrees F and below.
2) Observed foil being used as a cover over cracked cover/lid for bulk flour container. Replace to prevent potential contamination of flour.
Observed four live roaches and several dead roaches in kitchen area of establishment. Will not close establishment. Pest control invoice observed for 1/17/17. Note: Manager stated that he would have pest control return tomorrow.
 Photo: Yelp/Lou C. less Chatt-N-Paan ... more Photo: Yelp Image 15 of 24 Abasolo Restaurant and Seafood 1822 N. Main Ste. B Houston, TX 77009
Demerits: 18 Inspection Highlights: Condemned: Ten pounds of beans. Repair freezer to maintain food frozen. quarantined. Call 832-474-7125 for re-inspection and quarantine lift. Discontinue use of non-food grade bags for food storage. less Abasolo Restaurant and Seafood 1822 N. Main Ste. B Houston, TX 77009
Demerits: 18 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 16 of 24 Victor's Deli Indian Kitchen & Bar 1425 Nasa Rd 1 Houston, TX 77058
Demerits: 29 Inspection Highlights: Separate raw meats from ready-to-eat foods and organize all food containers in walk in cooler to prevent cross-contamination. (partially corrected)
Found deli meats at 49 and 50 degrees F in small prep cooler in main kitchen. Employee said it was brought from walk in cooler around 8 a.m. Remove to walk in cooler for rapid chill. Reach in cooler must be adjusted. less Victor's Deli Indian Kitchen & Bar 1425 Nasa Rd 1 Houston, TX 77058
Demerits: 29 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 17 of 24 Viet Tien Tofu & Fast Food 11210 Bellaire Blvd., Ste. 132 Houston, TX 77072
Demerits: 17 Inspection Highlights: Remove cardboard/ paper liners from shelving in the self service area.
The food establishment shall maintain on premises a certificate of completion of the food handler course for each food employee.
Photo: Yelp/Katrina V.
less Viet Tien Tofu & Fast Food 11210 Bellaire Blvd., Ste. 132 Houston, TX ... more Photo: Yelp Image 18 of 24 Tony Thai Restaurant 10613 Bellaire Blvd Ste. A-101 Houston, TX 77036
Demerits: 34 Inspection Highlights: Observed water temperature (72 degrees F) at the three-compartment sink. Repair to provide water under pressure at least 110 degrees F. Discontinue store unpackaged fish in contact with un-drained ice in walk in cooler.
 Photo: Yelp/Malynia T. less Tony Thai Restaurant 10613 Bellaire Blvd Ste. A-101 ... more Photo: Yelp Image 19 of 24 Sweet Tomatoes 17240 Tomball Pkwy Houston, TX 77064
Demerits: 20 Inspection Highlights: Provide cover/covering material for containers of lemon at self-serve area.
Fans attached to ceilings not kept clean. Observed exhaust fan covers, in restrooms used by employees, covered with dust/dirt. Clean immediately and maintain cleaned.
Photo: Yelp/Sweet Tomatoes less Sweet Tomatoes 17240 Tomball Pkwy ... more Photo: Yelp Image 20 of 24 TaconMadre #1 905 Edgebrook Houston, TX 77034
Demerits: 59 Inspection Highlights: Operating a food service/ processing establishment not conforming to requirements of Article II. Failure to provide water at 110 degrees F. Water observed at 75 degree F. Temporary closure and re-inspection fee applied. less TaconMadre #1 905 ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 21 of 24 Smoothie King 1901 N Shepard Dr. Ste. 6 Houston, TX 77008
Demerits: 30 Inspection Highlights: Failure to provide water at 110 degrees F. Provide hand-cleaning soap near hand-washing sink (Toilet Room).
less Smoothie King
... more Photo: Google Maps Image 22 of 24 Tippy's 7117 N Shepard Houston, TX 77091
Demerits: 22 Inspection Highlights: Raw animal foods not combined as ingredients not separated from each other during storage by arranging each type of food so that cross contamination is prevented.
Operating a food establishment without a City of Houston Food Service Manager present. less Tippy's ... more Photo: Google Maps Image 23 of 24 Boudreaulix's Cajun Kitchen 9774 Katy Fwy Ste. 100 Houston, TX 77055
Demerits: 16 Inspection Highlights: Observed uncovered food (ready-to-eat jalapeno cornbread) located in the walk-in cooler. Cover all food in refrigeration units to protect against possible contamination.
Observed missing floor tiles in the kitchen prep area (cook-line in front of cooking equipment). Replace floor tiles.
less Boudreaulix's Cajun Kitchen 9774 Katy Fwy Ste. 100 Houston, TX 77055
Demerits: 16
... more Photo: Google Maps Image 24 of 24 Houston Restaurant Violations Feb. 01 - Feb.08 1 / 24 Back to Gallery Sewage back up and a lack of hot water didn't sit well with inspectors this week.
The top health code offender this week is Hank's Cajun Crawfish located at 10800 Bellaire Houston, TX 77072 with violations totaling to 68 demerits. Their food service operations were temporarily ceased when water at the three-compartment sink measured lower than the 110 degree requirement at 90 degrees F.
Marble Slab Creamery located at 17195 Tomball Pkwy 77064 ran into the same problem and was also temporarily closed because their water temperature did not reach 110 degrees F.
Worst Violations: Food truck edition
One popular fast food chain at 535 El Dorado Blvd., was experiencing sewage back up in the back of the restaurant. The inspector noted that the "Establishment stated that sewage backup is often reoccurring." Yikes.
Before you head out for your next meal, be sure to click through our slideshow above for the list of restaurants with violations (Feb. 01 - 08)
During health inspections, inspectors distribute violations that carry a weight between 1 and 25, increasing in severity. The term "demerit" is used by city health inspectors to describe the weighted value assigned to each violation. The Houston Chronicle obtained the results of routine health inspections throughout the city and tallied each restaurant's demerits for a comprehensive list of violations. To view inspection reports online or learn more about food inspections , visit the health department website.
